title: SC EP:63 Bigfoot on the family farm
itunes:title: SC EP:63 Bigfoot on the family farm
description: Tonight we speak to a listener who grew up on a farm. Over several weeks he noticed animals that either came up missing or had their necks broken. The family had no idea what was killing their animals until one day he came across a Sasquatch while he was picking berries. The encounter changed his life.
